It works!

Oct 26, 2019 • Ayham Hasan

Hello!

I finally got this to work.

Welcome to my blog. After grueling hours of trial and error, wiping my macbook, almost throwing my windows pc out the door, I managed to get this jekyll blog up and running.

As a newly realized web dev, this was frustrating. Getting localhost to work but now deployment to work ARGH… Basically what I’m trying to say is: I miss doing for loops and arraylists in Java (speaking of…I have a java assignment due soon…).
